result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bobbie J Burk

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk: Amanda. 
Cases called at 10:04 am. 
INCLUDES: 22CF2 and 22CF684. 
State appears by ADA Cody Marschall.  Defendant appears from MCJ, and with Attorney Jack Mathie. 

Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
Waiver of Prelims have been filed in both cases; Court addresses that at this time: 
Court questions Defendant as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.

COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information to be E-filed.  R/W; 

State moves to: 
22CF2 -- 
Ct.2(Possession of THC/Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct.3(Possess Drug Paraphernalia/Repeater)>>DRI.

22CF684 --
Ct.1(Possession of Methamphetamine)>>DRI.

COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA to:
22CF2 -- 
Ct.1(Possession of Methamphetamine/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST.
Ct.4(Possession of Controlled Substance/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST.

COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding; 
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & voluntary made,  a factual basis & defendant guilty;

COURT ORDERS: 
Ct.1>> SWH for 2 years probation, to run concurrent to each other; CONDITIONS: Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent. AODA and any follow through.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Pay CC/DNA surcharge and provide sample. 
Ct.4>> SWH for 1 year probation, to run concurrent to each other; CONDITIONS: Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent. AODA and any follow through.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Pay CC/DNA surcharge and provide sample. 

COURT grants 43 days credit. 

Adj: 10:16 am.
Plea hearing on July 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Includes 22CF2, 22CF684
ADA Cody Marschall appears in person; Attorney John Mathie appears in person
PLEA set 7/19/22 at 10:00 am

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor
Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: INCLUDES 22CF2 & 22CF684:  No contact with victim(s): Reliance Inn and not to go on the premises. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.   Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. No possession of drug paraphernalia.   Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:05 p.m. 
INCLUDES: 22CF2, 22CF684. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, pro se.

ADA Puig notes Deft refused to speak to SPD this morning.
Deft makes statement re: SPD.

COURT QUASHES WARRANT.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Waived on both files. 

COURT ORDERS: $1,000.00 signature bond. 

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): Reliance Inn and not to go on the premises. 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No possession of drug paraphernalia. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
PH: 9/6/22 @ 9:10 a.m. 
PTC W/JA: 7/18/22 @ 9:05 a.m. 
CC: Branch 5. 

Adjourned: 2:11 p.m.
